Text:
A Reloaded release from "Skidrowzgames".. Seems legit. 
Not saying that the patch isn't real, just that website.

The multiplayer crack ain't working for me anymore, when I launch the game it doesn't open Uplay, and it wont connect to the Far Cry 3 service..
Any fix for this?
Any way to fix the save problems? Cant save the game. Every time restarting the game I lost my saved game.
